1.0.name: wordpress/desire
1.0.description: Crisp minimalist theme with light and dark color options. Desire theme comes with following features: Post slideshow feature, flexible layout, mobile friendly layout, tabbed content widget, two different blog styles, custom header, custom background. Valid XHTML and CSS 2/3. Wordpress compatibility higher than 2.8. Powered by wordpress and JQuery
